title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, brown, 2 reds, 2 purples) and dye (yellow) applied by pen or brush. Blue applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 56.5 x 59 cm (22 1/4 x 23 1/4 in.)
description: Curving vines enclosing motifs of people, buildings and a quail-like bird. Blue band at top.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, brown, 2 reds, 2 purples) and dye (yellow) applied by pen or brush. Blue applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-60.
